name: Best Of The Buds
description:
A top down, wave survival game, that me and some friends made for something at school. We continued to work on it after it was ready for school though.

Even though the main game is over, I'm still very willing to fix issues or change things that might be annoying. Keep in mind that this is our groups first game though.

You are P1G, a robot that has to protect a flower from bugs after a nuclear apocalypse. Its the only plant left, so protect it well.

If you find any bugs or issues, please report them in the comments.

There are a good couple secrets and a weapon specific to endless mode, so check that out for more content.

Game made with Construct, Visuals made with Piskel, Audio made using various sites.
